body:
You are at a clearing in the forest.
Dead leaves cover the ground.
A path leads north.

[[go north|WhiteHouse]]
title: Start

body:
You are standing in front of a white house.
There is a mailbox in front of the house.
A rocking chair stands on the front porch next to the door.
To the west you see an open window on the ground floor. 
[[west|Kitchen]]
[[enter|Entrance]]
title: WhiteHouse

body:
It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
-> turn on light
   the entrance is lit
   -> turn off light
      now it's dark again

here we go again
title: Entrance
